name: Biddlebaddleboo Browser
short_description:
Biddlebaddleboo Browser is for old computers with weak CPUs. Biddlebaddleboo Browser is very lightweight, based on the Internet Explorer engine, and it has the latest Flash Player built in. This requires .NET Framework 4.5.1 which is compatible with Windows Vista to Windows 8.1. The  Biddlebaddleboo Browser process runs at 27MB RAM (64-bit uses 40MB RAM) compared to Google Chrome that runs at 40MB and Internet Explorer that runs at 37MB. A build for Windows 98 to XP will be provided later.

If you like this project, you can consider donating to paypal at johnmega1@gmail.com

You can also donate via BitCoin to 1Ef6sdu6QtjdKPhLRq67ZzkHpu7QmmAnAj

summary: Biddlebaddleboo Browser is for old computers with weak CPUs.
